author: vgritsenko
msg: Fix processing of '/mountpath' URI in the sitemap servlet: issue a redirect to '/mountpath/'
since sitemap must always be mounted at path ending with '/'.

author: erodriguez
msg: Corrected padding algorithm error in DES encryption types (DIRSERVER-1100):
o  Corrected padding algorithm error in DesCbcCrcEncryption.
o  Also corrected padding algorithm error in DesCbcMd5Encryption, however algorithm error had no effect.
o  Added new test cases for above encryption types.
